hero.title: FARMSUK
hero.subtitle: Innovation for the Future, FarmSuk for Everyone
hero.description: A digital platform that drives intelligent smart farms with cutting-edge technology

products.title: What is FarmSuk?
products.description: FarmSuk is a digital platform focused on driving Smart Agriculture through technology news updates and serving as a marketplace for Smart Solutions that help farmers and related businesses access new innovations conveniently, quickly, and efficiently

collection.title: We aspire for FarmSuk to becomethe center of modern agriculture
collection.description: Integrating cutting-edge technology with traditional farming to boost productivity, reduce costs, and empower farmers to compete in the global market. Through our platform, users can stay updated on the latest trends in smart agriculture and buy or sell equipment, technology, and solutions tailored to their needs.

banner.description1: Reduce costs and increase yields using IoT and AI technology for precise farm control and management.
banner.description2: A centralized hub for all solutions‚Äîeasy to purchase, convenient, with consulting services and technical support.
banner.description3: Design and consulting services tailored to your farm.

vision.description1: A leading smart agriculture platform that elevates Thai farming into the digital era, enhances production efficiency, and promotes sustainability in the agricultural sector.
vision.description2: We believe that technology can be a key driver in improving farmers' quality of life, reducing labor challenges, and unlocking business opportunities through Smart Agriculture. We are committed to developing a platform that meets the needs of all stakeholders in the agricultural industry‚Äîfrom producers and entrepreneurs to consumers.

mission.subtitle1: Stay Continuously Updated with Modern News
mission.description1: Provide accurate and up-to-date information on electricity and solar cell technologies, ensuring that farmers receive precise and reliable insights.
mission.subtitle2: Create a Central Marketplace for Solar Products
mission.description2: Offer data that helps farmers and businesses access current information and explore new directions through IoT systems, AI utilization, and product control technologies.
mission.subtitle3: Develop Smart Technologies that Are Easy to Use and Accessible
mission.description3: Design systems tailored for farmers and shop owners, making it easier to manage operations and adopt advanced technologies effectively.

solutionhead.title4: So that you can be happy every day

aboutUs.headerSubtitle: Turnkey Communication Service Public Company Limited
aboutUs.headerDescription: A leader in information and communication technology for over 22 years.
aboutUs.TKC: Turnkey Communication Service Public Company Limited (TKC) was established in 2002 with a team of engineers with expertise and experience in telecommunications and information technology (ICT Solutions and Services).
aboutUs.TKC2: Starting as a telecommunications contractor for telecommunications service providers, we have continuously developed our business until becoming a public limited company in 2021 and listed on the Stock Exchange of Thailand in 2022.
aboutUs.TKC3: Starting as a telecommunications contractor for telecommunications service providers, we have continuously developed our business, becoming a public limited company in 2021 and listed on the Stock Exchange of Thailand in 2022.
aboutUs.visionDescription: To be a leader in providing comprehensive information and communications technology solutions to support the country's development into the digital age.
aboutUs.missionDescription: To deliver high-quality technology solutions and services that meet customer needs and create sustainable value for society.
aboutUs.iso9001: Telecommunication and Data Communication Engineering Services
aboutUs.iso2911: Systems and Software Engineering - Lifecycle Profiles for Very Small Entities
aboutUs.ranked: Ranked in the top 3 Huawei vendors (2014-2016)
aboutUs.ranked2: Ranked in the top 5 Ericsson vendors (2015)
aboutUs.certifiedHuawei: Certified Service Partner 5 stars from Huawei (2019)
aboutUs.event1: Established and registered as a limited company with registered capital of 5 million baht
aboutUs.event4: Increased registered capital to 30 million baht (2011)
aboutUs.event6: Expanded into the Data Communications line
aboutUs.event7: Established RAYTEL and acquired a 40% stake in TKC Plus (2012)
aboutUs.event8: Ranked among the top 3 service providers of Huawei and Ericsson (2014)
aboutUs.event9: Joined Huawei as a Global Supplier and became one of Ericsson's top 5 sales figures (2015)
aboutUs.event10: Won the bid for the 4G LTE Police Radio Project (2016)
aboutUs.event11: Received NBTC licenses and appointed as a partner for multiple brands (2017)
aboutUs.title5: Leading the Technology and Entering the 5G Market
aboutUs.event13: SKY Acquires a 34% Share and Receives ISO 9001:2015 Certification (2018)
aboutUs.event14: Starting 5G Business and Winning GDCC, CAT Filter, and USO Projects (2020)
aboutUs.event15: Expanding into IoT, AI, Cloud, and EV Charger Businesses
aboutUs.event17: IPO Offering Value 1,404 Million Baht and Listing on the SET (2022)
aboutUs.event18: Adding Digital Services Line and Investing in Energy and Technology Businesses
aboutUs.event19: Acquire 24.38% of AIT shares for 2.428 billion baht (2023)
aboutUs.event21: Acquire 25% of OTP shares and add corporate management and business development functions (2024)
aboutUs.event22: Change the name of the function from Telecommunications to Network Delivery
aboutUs.bdescription1: Business consulting and project management for modern information and communications technology systems
aboutUs.bservices1: Digital Enterprise Solution: Digital solution systems for organizations
aboutUs.bservices2: Telecommunications systems and mobile phone networks
aboutUs.bservices3: Radio Frequency Planning: Design and planning of frequencies
aboutUs.bservices5: Outsource Managed Services: Complete system management services
aboutUs.bdescription2: Business Consulting, Design, System Development, Distribution, and Installation of Computer Network Equipment
aboutUs.bservices10: IoT Smart City and Smart Infrastructure
aboutUs.bdescription3: Digital Solutions to meet the needs of the digital age
aboutUs.mproject1: 4G LTE Digital Radio Communication System Phase 1
aboutUs.mdescription1: Digital Radio Communication System Using Mission-Critical Push-to-Talk Over LTE
aboutUs.mdescription3: In collaboration with ICN as a joint venture
aboutUs.mdescription4: In collaboration with AIT and SKY as a joint venture
aboutUs.mproject5: Integrated Meteorology and Intelligent Service Project and earthquakes
aboutUs.mdescription5: In collaboration with Scan ICT Co., Ltd.
aboutUs.mclient6: Airports of Thailand Public Company Limited
aboutUs.mdescription6: COVID-19 disease warning and surveillance system
aboutUs.sbusiness2: Ericsson and Nokia, EV Charging Solutions
aboutUs.sbusiness4: Educational Technology and Cyber Security Training

info.info1: All electronic components are carefully packaged and shipped within 1‚Äì2 business days after your order is placed. We offer reliable shipping options with tracking.
info.info2: All orders are sent with anti-static packaging to protect sensitive electronic components.Tracking information will be provided via email once your order ships.
info.ReturnInfo: We stand behind the quality of our electronic components. If you're not satisfied with your DHT11 sensor, we offer a 30-day return policy.
info.ReturnInfo1: Item must be in original condition and packaging
info.WarrantyInfo1: Manufacturing defects: Full refund or replacement
info.WarrantyInfo2: DOA (Dead on Arrival): Free replacement within 7 days
info.WarrantyInfo3: Performance issues: Technical support and replacement if needed
info.WarrantyInfo4: To initiate a return, please contact our customer service team with your order number and reason for return. We'll provide you with return instructions and a tracking number.
info.WarrantyInfo5: Refunds are processed within 3-5 business days after we receive and inspect the returned item.

privacypolicy.title1: This Privacy Policy explains how Turnkey Communication Services Public Company Limited protects and manages your personal data in accordance with Thailand's Personal Data Protection Act B.E. 2562 (2019).
privacypolicy.content1.1: Turnkey Communication Services Public Company Limited is committed to safeguarding your personal data. This policy aims to help you understand our transparent data management practices.
privacypolicy.content1.2: ‚Ä¢ Company Name: Turnkey Communication Services Public Company Limited
privacypolicy.content1.3: ‚Ä¢ Address: 44/44 Soi Vibhavadi Rangsit 60, Yaek 18-1-2, Talad Bang Khen Subdistrict, Lak Si District, Bangkok 10210
privacypolicy.content2.0: We may collect the following types of personal data through your interactions with our E-commerce Website:
privacypolicy.content2.1.1: This includes data you voluntarily provide through interactions such as registration, ordering, or contacting us:
privacypolicy.content2.1.2: ‚Ä¢ Identification Data: e.g., title, full name, date of birth, nationality, ID card number or other identifiers for verification purposes
privacypolicy.content2.1.3: ‚Ä¢ Contact Information: e.g., email, phone numbers, delivery and billing addresses
privacypolicy.content2.1.4: ‚Ä¢ Account Information: username, encrypted password, security questions, and settings
privacypolicy.content2.1.5: ‚Ä¢ Transaction Information: order details, purchase history, encrypted payment data (we do not store full card numbers), payment status, refund information
privacypolicy.content2.1.6: ‚Ä¢ Communication Data: messages, chat, email, contact forms, reviews, surveys, and social media interactions
privacypolicy.content2.1.7: ‚Ä¢ Marketing Preferences: newsletter subscriptions, promotion participation, and stated communication preferences
privacypolicy.content2.2.1: Collected when you visit or interact with our site to enhance your user experience:
privacypolicy.content2.2.2: ‚Ä¢ Technical Data: IP address, browser type/version, device info, OS, timezone settings, browser plugins
privacypolicy.content2.2.3: ‚Ä¢ Usage Data: visited pages, time spent, click data, mouse movement, search terms, viewed/added products
privacypolicy.content2.2.4: ‚Ä¢ Location Data: general location (city, country) derived from your IP for localized content
privacypolicy.content2.2.5: ‚Ä¢ Cookies & Tracking Data: cookies, web beacons, and other tools to recognize and track you‚Äîsee our Cookie Policy for details
privacypolicy.content2.3.1: We may receive your data from third parties to provide or improve our services:
privacypolicy.content2.3.2: ‚Ä¢ Social Media Platforms: e.g., Google, Facebook‚Äîwhen you link or log in via these services
privacypolicy.content2.3.3: ‚Ä¢ Payment Processors & Financial Institutions: for payment confirmation and fraud prevention
privacypolicy.content2.3.4: ‚Ä¢ Marketing & Analytics Partners: for insights into market behavior and service improvements
privacypolicy.content2.3.5: ‚Ä¢ Public Databases & Government Entities: for identity verification or legal compliance
privacypolicy.content3.1: We process your personal data under legal grounds defined by the PDPA:
privacypolicy.content3.2: ‚Ä¢ Consent: For specified purposes, such as newsletters or non-essential cookies
privacypolicy.content3.3: ‚Ä¢ Contract: To fulfill contracts with you (e.g., processing orders, shipping)
privacypolicy.content3.4: ‚Ä¢ Legal Obligation: To comply with laws or official requirements (e.g., tax records, AML laws)
privacypolicy.content3.5: ‚Ä¢ Vital Interests: To protect someone's life or health in emergencies
privacypolicy.content3.6: ‚Ä¢ Public Task: For tasks in the public interest or official authority
privacypolicy.content3.7: ‚Ä¢ Legitimate Interests: For our legitimate business purposes, balanced against your rights
privacypolicy.point4: 4. How We Use Your Personal Data
privacypolicy.content4.1: We use your personal data for the following primary purposes: to provide our E-commerce website with the best possible service and to meet your needs:
privacypolicy.content4.4.2: ‚Ä¢ Responding to legal processes or authorities
privacypolicy.content5.1: We may share your personal data with third parties in the following circumstances and for the purposes specified: to enable the smooth operation of the E-commerce website and the provision of services:
privacypolicy.content5.2.1: We may share data for joint purposes or integrated service offerings with:
privacypolicy.content5.3.5: ‚Ä¢ Any entity as required by law
privacypolicy.content5.4.1: In case of mergers, acquisitions, or restructurings, personal data may be transferred to acquiring entities. We will notify you of such changes.
privacypolicy.content6.1: Where data must be transferred outside Thailand, we ensure protection by:
privacypolicy.content6.2: ‚Ä¢ Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) approved by PDPC
privacypolicy.content6.3: ‚Ä¢ Adequacy Decisions for countries with recognized data protections
privacypolicy.content6.4: ‚Ä¢ Binding Corporate Rules (BCRs) for internal data transfers
privacypolicy.content6.6: ‚Ä¢ Other safeguards such as encryption or pseudonymization
privacypolicy.content7.1: We retain your data only as long as needed:
privacypolicy.content7.2: ‚Ä¢ Account Data: for the duration of account activity + 1 year post-deletion
privacypolicy.content7.3: ‚Ä¢ Transaction Records: 5 years for tax and accounting purposes
privacypolicy.content7.4: ‚Ä¢ Marketing Data: as long as consent is given
privacypolicy.content7.5: ‚Ä¢ Legal Compliance: per applicable laws (e.g., AML, tax)
privacypolicy.content7.6: ‚Ä¢ Cookies/Technical Data: per our Cookie Policy
privacypolicy.point8: 8. Your rights under the Personal Data Protection Act
privacypolicy.content8.1: As a personal data subject, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:
privacypolicy.content8.1.1: You have the right to request access and obtain a copy of your personal data that we hold, and to request that we disclose the source of your personal data to which you have not given your consent.
privacypolicy.content8.2.1: You have the right to receive your personal data in a commonly used, machine-readable electronic format, using automated tools or devices, and to transmit or transfer the data to another data controller, unless this is technically impossible or required in the public interest.
privacypolicy.content8.3.1: You have the right to object to the processing of your personal data based on legitimate interests, direct marketing purposes, or scientific research purposes. History or Statistics
privacypolicy.content8.4.1: You have the right to request that inaccurate or incomplete personal data be corrected, kept current and accurate.
privacypolicy.content8.5.1: You have the right to request that personal data be erased, destroyed, or anonymized in certain circumstances, such as when the data is no longer necessary for the purposes for which it was collected or when you have withdrawn your consent.
privacypolicy.content8.6.1: You have the right to request that the processing of your personal data be restricted in certain circumstances, such as when you contest the accuracy of the data. or where the processing is unlawful.
privacypolicy.content8.7.1: Where the processing of your personal data is based on your consent, you have the right to withdraw your consent at any time. Withdrawal of consent will not affect the processing of your personal data that has already been carried out before the withdrawal of consent.
privacypolicy.content8.8.1: To exercise these rights, please contact us at privacy@company.com or use the online form on our website. We will process your request within 30 days of receiving a complete request and verifying your identity. We may request additional documentation to verify your identity to ensure that the data subject is the true owner of the data.
privacypolicy.content9.1: We apply appropriate technical and organizational measures:
privacypolicy.content9.2: ‚Ä¢ Encryption: SSL/TLS and encryption at rest
privacypolicy.content9.3: ‚Ä¢ Access Control: Role-based and multi-factor authentication
privacypolicy.content9.5: ‚Ä¢ Employee Training: On data protection and security awareness
privacypolicy.content9.7: ‚Ä¢ Backup & Recovery: Regular data backups and disaster recovery plans
privacypolicy.content10.1: We do not generally collect sensitive data unless:
privacypolicy.content10.2: ‚Ä¢ Necessary for specific services (e.g., health-related product advice)
privacypolicy.content10.4: ‚Ä¢ With your explicit consent Additional safeguards will be used where such data is collected.
privacypolicy.content11.1: Our services are not directed to children under 13. We do not knowingly collect data from minors. If you believe your child has submitted data without consent, contact dpo@company.com for prompt deletion.
privacypolicy.content12.1: We use cookies and similar tools for:
privacypolicy.content12.5: ‚Ä¢ Marketing and personalized advertising You can manage preferences via your browser or refer to our Cookie Policy.
privacypolicy.content13.1: If a breach poses a high risk to your rights:
privacypolicy.content13.2: ‚Ä¢ We will notify you promptly, including breach nature and recommended actions
privacypolicy.content13.3: ‚Ä¢ We will report to the PDPC within 72 hours as required by law
privacypolicy.content13.4: ‚Ä¢ A clear response plan is in place to mitigate damage
privacypolicy.content14.1: We may revise this Policy periodically. If changes significantly affect your rights, we will notify you via:
privacypolicy.content14.4: ‚Ä¢ Other appropriate means We encourage regular reviews of this policy.
privacypolicy.content15.1: For questions or rights requests, contact our DPO:
privacypolicy.content15.4: ‚Ä¢ Address: 44/44 Soi Vibhavadi Rangsit 60, Yaek 18-1-2, Talad Bang Khen, Lak Si, Bangkok 10210
privacypolicy.content16.1: If you believe your concerns have not been resolved, you may contact the PDPC:
privacypolicy.content16.4: ‚Ä¢ Address: Please refer to PDPC's official website for the latest address
privacypolicy.content17.1: This Privacy Policy is governed by the laws of Thailand, including the Personal Data Protection Act B.E. 2562 and other relevant regulations, as may be amended from time to time.
privacypolicy.howtocontectus: How to Contact Us to Exercise Your Rights
privacypolicy.youareentitled: You are entitled to exercise your rights under the Personal Data Protection Act (PDPA) through the following means:
privacypolicy.address2: 44/44 Soi Vibhavadi Rangsit 60 Yaek 18-1-2, Talat Bang Khen Subdistrict, Lak Si District, Bangkok 10210
privacypolicy.wewillrespond: We will respond to your request within 30 business days from the date we receive a complete request and successfully verify your identity.
privacypolicy.ifyouhave: If you have any further questions about our Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please do not hesitate to contact our Data Protection Officer. We are always happy to assist you.

termscondition.youquestion: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us through the following channels:
termscondition.content1: Welcome to [your website/company name]! By accessing or using our Services, you agree to be bound by all of these Terms and Conditions. If you disagree with any part of these Terms, please refrain from using our Services immediately. Your continued use of the Services will be deemed acceptance of these Terms, as amended.
termscondition.content2: The Services and all original content, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, images, and software, are the exclusive property of [your website/company name] and are protected by international copyright and trademark laws. Reproduction, modification, distribution, or display of any content without our prior written permission is prohibited.
termscondition.content3: When you create an account with us, you must provide accurate, complete, and current information at all times. Failure to do so constitutes a breach of these Terms, which may result in your account being suspended or your use of our Services immediately. You are responsible for maintaining your password and all activity that occurs under your account.
termscondition.content4: In no event shall [your website name/company name] or its directors, employees, and affiliates be liable for any direct, indirect, or consequential damages arising from your use of, or inability to use, our services, including any lost profits, data, or goodwill.
termscondition.content5: We reserve the right to modify or change these Terms at any time in our sole discretion. We will try to provide at least 30 days' notice before any new terms become effective. By continuing to use the Services after the modifications become effective, you accept and agree to be bound by the modified Terms.
